text: Te ca navā bhikkhū therehi bhikkhūhi ovadiyamānā anusāsiyamānā uḷāraṃ pubbenāparaṃ visesaṃ jānanti
edit: Te ca navā bhikkhū therehi bhikkhūhi ovadiyamānā anusāsiyamānā uḷāraṃ pubbenāparaṃ visesaṃ jānanti

translations.transtext: Those new monks, being given advices [and] instructed by senior monks, know the excellent, superb [knowledge] unknown formerly.
